item.title: CSV edit by pandas
item.description: Modfying csv files using pandas, python to import csv file into python import pandas data = pd.read_csv('/home/hoopoe/Documents/Real_time_air_pollution_Mod_Proj-2013-2014/obj2/237.csv') to query the specfic column in data frame data['SamplingDate'] to specifiy the column as datetime formate column for pandas data['SamplingDate'] = pd.to_datetime(data['SamplingDate']) to avoid date and month mismatch specify the formate of date as data['SamplingDate'] = pd.to_datetime(data['SamplingDate'],format='%d/%m/%Y') to sort the data based on date column descending dataso=data.
